column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My hair is getting to long for the warm weather that is arriving so I call the hair salon and make an appointment to have my haircut .
#text=The next day I go to the salon for my appointment , as I enter I was greeted and ask to have a seat and that they would be ready for me in a few minutes .
#text=My stylist comes over and asks me how I would like my haircut as we walk over to their station .
#text=I consider getting new style and we look over a few books that have photographs inside .
#text=I decide just to keep my original style and the stylist takes me over to the wash station and washes and conditions my hair .
#text=I go back to the chair where the stylist is stationed and she begins to cut my hair .
#text=It takes about 20 minutes for her to cut my hair and style and blow-dry my hair , but when she finishes I am very pleased with the way my hair looks .
#text=I tip the woman and thank her , then go to the counter to pay for my haircut .
#text=I thank them and leave the salon , feeling very happy and looking beautiful .
